content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz Trabelsi, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I have to say that I am quite excited about the possibility of renting it out to someone like you. As a landlord, I am always looking for tenants who are serious about paying the highest rental price possible. So, what do you think? Are you willing to pay a fair and reasonable price for this beautiful 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Aziz Trabelsi: I am a student and I am looking for the lowest rental price possible. I am very responsible and reliable, and I will pay the rent on time. I am also on good terms with my landlord. So, I would like to negotiate the rental price with you. Can you please tell me the current rental price?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Aziz Trabelsi, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate the rental price with me. I am sorry to say that I am not willing to accept the rental price that you have proposed. I am looking for a tenant who is willing to pay the highest possible rental price for this apartment, and I believe that you are not willing to do that. I hope that we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. Can you please tell me what rental price you are willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Aziz Trabelsi: I am willing to pay a fair rental price, but I am looking for the lowest possible rental price that you are willing to accept. Can you please tell me the current rental price?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia
